snippet: The Fruit of the Loom brand is playing up its attempt to attract more young buyers, even if it means less time for the familiar characters who dress like fruits and leaves.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column highlights campaign for Fruit of the Loom brand, which is playing up its attempt to attract more young buyers, while trying not to alienate its longtime core customers.
lead_paragraph: The Fruit of the Loom brand is playing up its attempt to attract more young buyers, even if it means less time for the familiar characters who dress like fruits and leaves.

headline.seo: Fruit of the Loom Bids for the Young and Fit
headline.main: A Contemporary Spin on an Old-School Brand
